attributes.action: Do not hold a 2nd referendum on Brexit. The people of the UK have spoken!
attributes.additional_details: People who voted BREXIT are intelligent people not racists or homophobic. As portrayed. We are a people who are dissatisfied and fed up. Our NHS, EX FORCES guys, our elderly, our vulnerable and homeless people have been neglected too long. In 2016 and 1000's of UK citizens turning to food banks every week. We have to got to reclaim our Country. The PEOPLE of UK have put our heads above the parapet just like our WW1 and WW2 HEROS did for our FREEDOM.
attributes.background:
England 53.2% leave 
Wales 51.7% leave
Northern Ireland 44.3% leave
Scotland 38% leave. 
Don't the voices of these people count? London and Scotland are stomping their feet as for once it hasn't gone their way! Their scaremongering failed. So they now are trying to change democracy.
